message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it for $22,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 undervalues the product significantly, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I believe this price reflects the true value you'll gain from it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me at that price?
